00037 namespace luabind { namespace detail {
00038 
00039     struct LUABIND_API registration
00040     {
00041         registration();
00042         virtual ~registration();
00043 
00044     protected:
00045         virtual void register_(lua_State*) const = 0;
00046 
00047     private:
00048         friend struct ::luabind::scope;
00049         registration* m_next;
00050     };
00051 
00052 }} // namespace luabind::detail
00053 
00054 namespace luabind {
00055 
00056     struct LUABIND_API scope
00057     {
00058         scope();
00059         explicit scope(std::auto_ptr<detail::registration> reg);
00060         scope(scope const& other_);
00061         ~scope();
00062 
00063         scope& operator=(scope const& other_);
00064 
00065         scope& operator,(scope s);
00066 
00067         void register_(lua_State* L) const;
00068 
00069     private:
00070         detail::registration* m_chain;
00071     };
00072 
00073     class LUABIND_API namespace_ : public scope
00074     {
00075     public:
00076         explicit namespace_(char const* name);
00077         namespace_& operator[](scope s);
00078 
00079     private:
00080         struct registration_;
00081         registration_* m_registration;
00082     };
00083 
00084     class LUABIND_API module_
00085     {
00086     public:
00087         module_(lua_State* L_, char const* name);
00088         void operator[](scope s);
00089 
00090     private:
00091         lua_State* m_state;
00092         char const* m_name;
00093     };
00094 
00095     inline module_ module(lua_State* L, char const* name = 0)
00096     {
00097         return module_(L, name);
00098     }
00099 
00100 } // namespace luabind
